ygData.subject: Players and their servers...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi you all! My name is Sandy and Im a bi single father of one. Ive been playing EQ since about May and thuroughly ENJOY it! I didnt think you could have such
ygData.messageBody:
Hi you all!

My name is Sandy and Im a bi single father of one. Ive been playing EQ
since about May and thuroughly ENJOY it! I didnt think you could have such
an addictive thing without it being ingestable! Eq is great! The GUILD idea
is great! The only troubles I see are seeking recruitment outside our list.
Unfortunately the general populace is Homophobic from what Ive seen on E'ci
(Sad- yes). Though I may have some chance with contacts there of like mind
as us.
My Characters on E'ci are:

Jadeeye - 15th Level (14th now and then due to those pesky
Minotaurs) - Female Wood Elf Warrior
Bealtaine - 6th Level Druid Male Half Elf - Got tired of asking
for SOW and BINDS...wanna make my own!

I will be on tonight for the meeting so no problem there. If any of
you are also on E'ci drop me an email either here at my work emial or my
home one (sandymann@...).

Thanks youse all!

Sandy

(Time to show Norrath what kind of Superheros we REALLY ARE! )
